en: Anything smells, tastes, or resembles a fish in some way. Suspicious people and situations are also called by this word.

words.comment: If you say something is fishy, it probably means you think something is suspicious. If you're sitting next to someone eating a tuna sandwich, though, you could just mean you smell a fishy odor. / A guy looking over your shoulder while you use an ATM is fishy.
